Save up to $300 on Apple's M4 iPad Pro - Image credit: Peanuts

Apple's M4 iPad Pro is in high demand, and despite Christmas being more than two weeks away, ship times are slipping. We've rounded up the top markdowns, with savings up to $300 off.

Get limited-time iPad Pro savings

Apple's latest M4 iPad Pro is heavily discounted as retailers compete for your business with last-minute deals knocking up to $300 off 11-inch and 13-inch models.

11-inch iPad Pro M4

  • M4, 256GB, Standard Glass, Wi-Fi: $849 ($150 off) with My Best Buy Plus
  • M4, 512GB, Standard Glass, Wi-Fi: $1,049 ($150 off) with My Best Buy Plus
  • M4, 1TB, Standard Glass, Wi-Fi: $1,399 ($200 off) with My Best Buy Plus
  • M4, 2TB, Nano-texture Glass, Wi-Fi, Space Black: $1,799 at Amazon ($300 off)

13-inch iPad Pro M4

  • M4, 256GB, Standard Glass, Wi-Fi: $1,099 at Amazon & Best Buy ($200 off)
  • M4, 512GB, Standard Glass, Wi-Fi, Silver: $1,299 at Amazon & Best Buy ($200 off)
  • M4, 2TB, Standard Glass, Wi-Fi: $2,099 ($200 off) at Best Buy

Save on even more models

You can also find sale prices on the iPad 9th and 10th Generation, with deals from $199.

Budget-friendly iPad deals

  • iPad 9th Generation (64GB, Wi-Fi): $199.99 ($120 off)
  • iPad 10th Generation (64GB, Wi-Fi, select colors): $279 at Amazon & Best Buy ($70 off)
  • iPad mini 7 (128GB, Wi-Fi): $449 ($50 off) at Best Buy
  • M2 iPad Air 11-inch (128GB, Wi-Fi): $499 ($100 off) at Best Buy

You can also find dozens of markdowns on current and closeout models in our iPad Price Guide.
